K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418a-1: a'arya shr'i m'a la de b'i sing ha n'a da n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418a-3: 'phags pa lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418a-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-0: bcom @418b ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban [*ba na?] bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-1: de nas de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-2: btsun mo dam pa btsun mo phreng ldan mas lha mo dpal phreng chos rtogs nas ring po ma lon pa'i bar skabs su gtam glengs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-4: kye ma khyed kyi sras mo lha mo dpal phreng ni mdzangs shing gsal la zab cing mkhas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-5: gal te ngas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba lta na tshegs chung ngus chos rtogs la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa la yang the tshom ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-7: de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis btsun mo phreng ldan ma la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-9: 'u bu cag gis lha mo dpal phreng la pho nya nus pa shig btang gor ma chag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-10: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-11: btsun mo phreng ldan mas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi tshig de mnyan nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-12: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-13: btsun mo phreng ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa rnam pa du ma bris te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-14: nang kor ma yid brtan pa zla ba lta bu zhes bya ba de'i lag tu 'phrin yig bskur nas de mthar gyis song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-15: grong khyer 'thab med du phyin nas btsun mo'i 'khor du song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:418b-16: lha mo dpal phreng la phyag 'tshal nas phan tshun kun dga' ba'i gtam byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-0: lha mo dpal phreng gi lag tu 'phrin @419a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-2: de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis pha ma la gus pas 'phrin yig de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas mgo bo la gtugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-3: bdag nyid kyis 'phrin yig bklags nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-4: 'phrin yig gi don bzang po zhes nges par bzung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-5: don du nges par bzung nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-6: mgo bo lcogs te ya mtshan du bzung nas lha mo dpal phreng gi nang kor ma zla ba lta bu la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-7: sangs rgyas zhes bya'i sgra 'di ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-8: 'jig rten dag na shin tu dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-9: gal te tshig 'di bden gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-10: bdag gis khyod la bgo ba sbyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-11: gal te bcom ldan sangs rgyas de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-12: 'jig rten don du byung gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-13: de ni bdag la thugs rje yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-14: bstan pa'i ched du 'dir sbyon cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-15: de nas de yi skad cig la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-16: mgon po gshegs nas mkha' la bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-17: bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas sku //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-19: de nas de'i tshe lha mo ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-20: gus pas 'khor bcas langs nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-21: spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-22: smra ba'i mchog la bstod pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-23: mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-24: dpal dpe gang na'ang yod ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-25: bsam yas dpe zla ma mchis pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419a-27: mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-0: ye shes la yang bas @419b ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-1: khyod kyi sangs rgyas chos mi bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-2: de bas thub khyod skyabs kyang lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-3: bsam yas rtsal ldan khyod kyis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-4: sku gsung thugs kyi skyon rnams bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-5: nyams ma mchis pa'i sa brnyes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-6: chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-7: shes bya thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-8: ye shes sku yi dbang phyug ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-9: sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-10: mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-11: gzhal yas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-13: bsam yas chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-14: mtha' yas gzugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo; ;bdag ni da ltar mgon pos bskyabs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-15: byang chub sa bon rnam par bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-16: slan chad srid pa gzhan dag dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-17: thub pas bdag la phan gdags mdzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-19: sngon tshe rnams su lha mo khyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-20: ngas ni byang chub sbyor bar byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-21: phyis kyang tshe rabs gzhan dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-22: ngas ni rjes su gzung bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-23: lha mo dpal phreng gis gsol pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-24: bdag gis 'di dang gzhan dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-25: bsod nams gang dang gang bgyis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-26: bsod nams de yis mgon po khyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-27: rtag tu bdag gis mthong bar shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-28: de nas lha mo dpal phreng dang lhan cig tu btsun mo kun dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:419b-29: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du lha mo dpal @420a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-1: phreng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-2: lha mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i yon tan dag gis mngon par bstod pa'i bsod nams bsags pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-3: lha mo khyod bskal pa tshad med grangs med par lha dang mi'i rgyal srid phun tshogs pa myong bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-4: tshe rabs thams cad du yang nga mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-5: nga la mngon sum du 'di lta bu'i bstod pa bsngags pas bsngags par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-7: da phyin chad bskal pa brgya stong grangs med pa nyi shu na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-8: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-9: de'i tshe yang lha mo khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ngan song dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-10: de'i tshe sems can rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-11: sems can de dag la nad kyang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-13: yid du mi 'ong ba'i gnod pa yang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-14: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyi ming yang mi grag par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420a-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang 'di ltar bde ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420b-9: longs spyod thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420b-10: sems can de dag shin tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420b-14: de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag byas pa'i sems can rnams de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'du bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420b-15: de nas lha mo dpal phreng gi lung bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa thos nas lha dang mi dpag tu med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420b-16: de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420b-17: de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas thal mo sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420b-18: yid dam chen po bcu yang dag par blangs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420b-22: da slan chad bdag gi tshul khrims kyi dus las 'da' ba'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:420b-24: yid dam dang po 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421a-0: da slan chad bdag gis bla ma @421a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421a-1: dag la ma gus pa'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421a-3: yid dam gnyis pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421a-5: da slan chad bdag gis gang du'ang sems can la khro ba dang gnod sems kyi sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421a-7: yid dam gsum pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421a-9: da slan chad bdag gis gzhan gyi dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421a-10: gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa dag la phrag dog gi sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421a-12: yid dam bzhi pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421a-14: da slan chad bdag gis tha na kham slad ma tsam la yang ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421a-16: yid dam lnga pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421a-18: da slan chad bdag gis bdag nyid kyis longs spyod pa'i slad du nor yongs su bzung bar mi bgyi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421b-0: sems can dbul po sdug bsngal zhing mgon ma mchis pa yongs su smin par bgyi @421b ba'i slad du yongs su gzung bar 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421b-2: yid dam drug pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421b-4: da slan chad bdag gis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa na bdag la sman du re ba'i slad du sems can bsdu bar mi bgyi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421b-7: zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421b-9: ldog pa ma mchis par sems can yang dag par bsdu bar 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421b-11: yid dam bdun pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421b-13: da slan chad bdag gis sems can mgon ma mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421b-16: nad kyis nyam thag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421b-20: tshigs chen pos 'tsho ba dag mthong na de dag la sman ma btags par gom pa gcig kyang dor bar mi bgyi'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421b-22: bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de dag mthong na sdug bsngal de dang de dag las yongs su thar par bgyis la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:421b-23: nor gyi bsdu bas bsgrubs nas slad kyis bdag mchi bar bgyis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422a-0: yid dam brgyad pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi @422a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422a-1: bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422a-3: da slan chad bdag gis phag tshong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422a-4: bya la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las kyis 'tsho zhing de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i chos 'dul ba las nyams pa'i tshul can dag mthong na yal bar mi 'dor gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422a-10: rgyal po'i po [*pho?] brang 'khor gang dang gang dag na bdag gi mchid nyan pa de dang de dag tu tshar dgum pa'i rigs pa rnams ni tshar dgum /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422a-11: sman gdags pa'i rigs pa rnams ni sman gdags par 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422a-15: sman gdags pas ni 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i slad du ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422a-16: dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas na lha dang mi rnams kyi lus rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422a-17: ngan song rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422a-19: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rjes su bskor bar bgyid pa lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422a-21: yid dam dgu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-0: da slan chad bdag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba las bskyud par bgyi @422b ba'i sems gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-1: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-3: dam pa'i chos bzung ba las bskyud na theg pa chen po bskyud par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-5: theg pa chen po bskyud na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-6: pha rol tu phyin pa bskyud par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-8: pha rol tu phyin pa bskyud na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-9: theg pa chen po la mi 'dun par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang theg pa la ma nges pa de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la mi 'dun par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-12: rang nyam du gnas par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-14: de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sar mchi ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-16: 'di ni bdag gis nyes dmigs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-17: gnod pa chen por mthong lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-19: dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa las ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-20: bdag dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phan yon dpag tu ma mchis ba'i don yongs su grub par mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-22: dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i yid dam bcu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-24: bdag gi yid dam chen po bcu po 'di dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:422b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs pa lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-0: 'di la chos kyi rje nyid bdag gi dpang du @423a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-3: ston pa mngon sum du gyur tu lags kyang sems can dge ba'i rtsab chung ngu la la dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-4: kye ma yid dam chen po bcu po 'di dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-5: lcogs par dka'o snyam du bdag la the tshom za'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-6: yid gnyis 'tshal ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-7: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis yun ring por gnod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-11: de dag nyid la phan gdags pa'i slad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di bgyi bar 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-14: bdag gis yid dam chen po bcu po gang dag blangs pa'i yid dam chen po bcu po 'di dag la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-16: gal te bdag ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ba lta na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-18: bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'dis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-19: lha'i sgra grag par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-20: des kyang bdag gi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di len par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-21: lha mo dpal phreng gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-22: de'i tshe lha'i me tog gi char chen po bab nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:423a-23: bar snang las lha'i sgra grag par gyur te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440a-1: pa'i sa la so sor rtog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440a-3: de dag gis rtogs nas kyang sa de la rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can du 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440a-5: de dag gis kyang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bdag gis ni 'di ltar lhag ma dang bcas pa'i sa thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440a-6: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to snyam du 'tshal lo; ;de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440a-9: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'du ba'i slad du ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440a-11: theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440a-13: de ltar na theg pa gsum po 'di dag ni theg pa gcig kho na'i grangs su mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440a-15: theg pa gcig rtogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440a-17: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bgyi ba de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440a-19: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings zhes bgyi ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i tshig bla dvags lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440a-21: chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg pa gcig pa lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440b-0: chos kyi sku yang gzhan @440b ma lags kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid chos kyi sku lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440b-4: chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg pa gcig gi mtha' lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440b-6: theg pa gcig gi mtha' zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gcig gi mthar sbyar ba'i tshig bla dvags lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440b-7: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni dus kyi mtha' mchis pa la gnas pa ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gnas pa'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'jig rten la sman pa'i slad du dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i thugs rje can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440b-14: dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i thugs dam mnga' ba ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440b-15: kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir dus kyi mtha' med par snying rje dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440b-16: dus kyi mtha' med par yi dam bcas pa'i sems can aa la la zhes mchi ba dag ni; bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440b-18: kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir chos mi zad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:440b-21: skyabs kyi sems can aa la la zhes mchi ba dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-0: de lta lags pas 'di ltar de bzhin @441a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-1: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni skyabs ma mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-2: skyob pa ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten na phyi ma'i mthar thug par skyabs mi zad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-6: chos zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i tshig bla dvags lags so; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-7: dge 'dun zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi tshig bla dvags lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-9: skyabs 'di gnyis ni de'i yan lag gi skyabs zhes bgyi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-10: skyabs kyi rab ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-11: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-13: theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos kyang chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-15: de'i pha rol na theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos kyis ni bgyi ba ci yang ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-17: theg pa gsum pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-20: bgyi ba dang bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-21: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-23: de ltar na skyabs 'di gnyis ni skyabs kyi rab ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441a-24: dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i skyabs lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441b-1: sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas btul ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi ba na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441b-2: chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa la mngon par dad pas chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang skyabs su mchi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441b-4: chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa la mngon par dad pas skyabs su mchi ba ni gnyis la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi ba lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi ba ni chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa la mngon par dad pas mchi bar bgyi ba ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi ba ni skyabs su mchi ba yang dag pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441b-10: skyabs su mchi ba gnyis kyang yang dag par na de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi zhes bgyi ba'i mtha' lags par khong du chud par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441b-11: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441b-14: skyabs gnyis po yang gzhan ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid skyabs gsum lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441b-17: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441b-19: theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gsung dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:441b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa lags pa'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442a-2: mos pa ji lta ba dag la de bzhin gshegs pas theg pa gnyis po thabs kyi bsgrub pas bsgrubs pa de dag kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442a-3: theg pa chen po bdag nyid kyi slad du lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442a-5: theg pa 'di gnyis kyi ming ni ma mchis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442a-7: yang dag par na 'di la theg pa gcig po ni theg pa yang dag pa lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442a-8: theg pa gsum yang dag par 'du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442a-11: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i bden pa thog mar mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa gcig pus ni gnas kyi sa de snyed cig spong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442a-13: shes pa de gcig pus yongs su 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i yon tan bzhi po rnams mngon sum du bgyid par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442a-14: don bzhi po bdag nyid chos nyid kyis shin tu so sor rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442a-16: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa la shes pa bzhi 'pho ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442a-17: dmigs pa bzhi 'pho ba ma mchis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442a-19: 'jig rten las 'das pa shes pa rdo rje lta bu ni mi 'pho ba'i chos can lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442a-21: de ltar 'di la nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442a-22: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi sa spong ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa dang po ni yang dag pa'i shes pa lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-0: de @442b dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa rnam pa gnyis kyi sa gnas kyi sa spong ba ni ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-3: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-4: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-5: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs spong lags so; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-6: nyon mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad 'byed pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de ni yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-8: 'phags pa'i bden pa 'tshal ba dang po ni mthar phyin pa'i shes pa ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-9: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa'i shes pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-11: 'phags pa'i don de ni nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-12: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig bla dvags ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-15: rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan tshad mchis pa lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-17: de'i yan lag gi yon tan dang ldan pa'i slad du nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-18: rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'phags pa zhes bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-20: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bgyi ba de dag ni nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-21: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:442b-22: nyan thos dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-0: bden pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa @443a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-1: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thog mar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par mkhyen la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-2: so sor rtogs nas mngon par mkhyen pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs su bcug pa'i 'jig rten la bstan cing btags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-3: de'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-5: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa ni zab cing phra la brtag par dka' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-6: khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag mi nus la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-7: rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-8: mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-9: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-10: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-12: zab mo bstan pa bshad pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lags pa'i slad du ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-15: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa 'di'i gnas lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i gnas zab pas na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don yang zab cing phra la brtag par dka' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443a-20: rtogs par dka' zhing brtag mi nus la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-0: rtog @443b ge'i spyod yul pa ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-1: mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-2: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa zhes bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-4: gang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs kyi mthas dkris pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la the tshom ma mchis pa de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs nas rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la yang the tshom ma mchis pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-6: gang gi yid de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-8: sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dgongs pa'i mthar phyin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-10: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa 'di gnyis la yid ches shing dad de mos pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-12: de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis ni rig par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-14: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-15: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-16: bgyi ba ma mchis pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-18: de la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba mchis pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-19: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-20: btags pa tshad ma mchis pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:443b-21: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-1: gzhan gyis bgyid du stsal kyang sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-2: sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-3: sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyi ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-4: sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad bsgom par mi nus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-6: de lta lags pas 'khor ba la yang 'dus byas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-8: mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dus byas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-11: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-13: de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-14: btags pa dag dpag tu ma mchis pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-15: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-17: bdag nyid kyis bsal kyang zin pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-18: zin pa'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-19: zin pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyi ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-20: zin pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bsgom par nus pa'i slad du ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444a-22: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa bshad pa gang lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bstan par bgyi ba ma mchis pa bzhi po dag la rdzogs par mdzad pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444b-3: rang sangs rgyas rnams ni rdzogs par bgyid pa ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444b-4: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444b-6: rab 'bring tha ma'i chos rtogs pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rtogs pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444b-8: ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i don bshad par bgyi ba ma mchis pa dag la rdzogs par mdzad pa lags she na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni yongs su mkhyen /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444b-13: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'du ba'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad ni spangs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444b-15: yid kyi phung po thams cad 'gog pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'gog pa ni mngon sum du mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444b-17: sdug bsngal 'gog pa ni chos chud gson pa ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:444b-18: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:445a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku thog ma @445a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:445a-1: ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:445a-8: rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:445a-9: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs nas nges par grol ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:445a-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad du mi gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:445a-11: grol bar shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed dang ldan pa ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i ming gis bstan pa'i slad du ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:445a-13: de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi sku nyon mongs pa'i sbubs nas nges par grol ba zhes bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:445a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po shes pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:445a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:445a-17: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon ma mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:445a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni thugs su chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:445a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong pa nyid shes pa ni 'di gnyis lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:445a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs dang tha dad du gnas pa ma grol bas shes pa rnams kyis stong pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451a-3: theg pa chen po'i lam du yang zhugs par gyur pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451a-6: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag rang gis rig pa'i chos zab mo dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451a-8: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos dang mthun par sdud pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451a-10: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos zab mo dag la bdag nyid kyi shes pa zhum par 'tshal nas 'di bdag gis mi shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451a-11: don 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen par zad do zhes bcom ldan 'das la sems rnam par gtod par bgyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451a-12: sems rnam par gtod pa de dang ldan pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451a-14: gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo chos zab mo dag la ma rmas ma nyams par bdag nyid la bsrung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451a-15: bsod nams kyang mang du bskyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451a-16: theg pa chen po'i lam du yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ba lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451b-0: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gsum po 'di dag las gzhan pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag ni chos zab mo dag la nan tan gyis mchog tu bzung nas go lob kyi sems @451b 'dzin cing mngon par zhen te ston par bgyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451b-1: kun tu smra bar bgyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451b-3: bdag ni de dag la dam pa'i chos la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451b-5: sa bon rul pa lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451b-6: rgyal po'i thad du'ang mchi la brlag par bgyi'o zhes mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451b-8: sa bon rul par gyur pa de dag ni lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451b-10: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis legs par tshar bcad par bgyi ba lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451b-11: de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis de skad ces gsol nas 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng la legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451b-14: lha mo khyod kyis dus dang skabs su chos zab mo dag la bdag nyid yang dag par bsrung ba'i thabs kyis don bstan pa bshad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451b-15: dam pa'i chos kyi dgra tshar bcad pa bshad pa legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451b-18: khyod ni sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin pas khyod kyis don bshad pa 'di las ngo mtshar che ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:451b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar bas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus la 'od kyis khyab par mdzad nas ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452a-0: zhabs kyi gom pa 'dor ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan yod kyi grong @452a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452a-1: khyer ga la ba der gshegs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452a-2: de nas lha mo dpal phreng 'khor dang bcas pas spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas blta bas chog mi shes shing mig mi 'dzum pas blta bas bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452a-3: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mig rgyang gis mi sleb par gyur pa de'i tshe lha mo dpal phreng 'khor dang bcas pa mchog tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i bzhin dang ldan pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452a-4: gcig gis gcig gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams rnam pa du mar bsngags shing sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa ma brjed bzhin du grong khyer 'thab med du dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452a-5: de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis rang gi khyim thab rgyal po grags pa'i bshes gnyen theg pa chen po la nges par bcug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452a-6: grong khyer chen po'i bud med kyi tshogs bu mo lo bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452a-7: rgyal po grags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa'i 'khor khye'u lo bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452a-8: de ltar grong khyer thams cad theg pa chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du byon te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-0: nang du gshegs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo @452b la yang bka' stsal cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-1: lha'i dbang po brgya byin la yang dgongs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-2: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-7: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-11: kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-12: kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-15: dge bsnyen ma dag la shod cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-18: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-22: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:452b-25: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mdo sde 'di'i don thams cad ma lus par shes pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-0: nye bar brtag par mi nus na sems @453a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-1: can gzhan dag gis lta ci smos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-3: de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zab la yon tan chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-5: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan gyi ming yongs su brjod pa tsam zhig bshad kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-6: legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-8: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-9: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-14: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa yang dag par bstod pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-16: 'di ni yid dam chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-17: smon lam thams cad sdud pa smon lam chen po zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-18: dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-19: theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-20: 'phags pa'i bden pa brgyad bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453a-22: chos kyi sku bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-0: stong pa nyid @453b kyi don gyi dgongs pa yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-1: bden pa gcig bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-5: ther zug pa dang; skyabs gcig tu gyur pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-6: phyin ci log gi sa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-7: rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i sems la dgongs pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi yang dag pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-10: 'di ni lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-12: mdo 'dir bstan pa gang dag bshad pa de dag thams cad ni rgyu ba bcad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-13: nges pa'i don dang ston pa gcig pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-15: lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngas khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-16: 'jig rten na dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad du yang dag par sgrogs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-18: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhing kun chub par byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-21: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:453b-22: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:454a-5: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:454a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:454a-7: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:454a-8: 'phags pa lha mo dpal phreng gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:454a-9: 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:454a-10: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-013:454a-12: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba zhang ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
